fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Imprison (Day): Same as ToL Prince, but no limit to a single person. You may imprison Unseen members.
- Execute (Night/Day, 3 uses): Execute your jailed target or your hostage.
- Hostage (Night): Keep your target in jail the next day. The Town will be notified they are missing for an unknown reason and they cannot access the day chat.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You occupy your jailed and hostage targets.
- You occupy their visitors.
- You may multitask.
